name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 077
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, The Avengers Are Assembling. Whenever Cap yells out those words I get chills. Colors inspired by the OG Avengers, Captain America,  Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk and Thor.
